author: Pred√§
install_msg:
Thank you for installing the betterslots cog !
Don't forget to `[p]load betterslots` !

Important note : You will need to use `[p]reload economy` command to bring back original slots if you unload or uninstall this cog.
name: betterslots
short: Replace slots command with a new one with animation.
description: Replace original slot command for a new one in embed with a little animation.
